titles.title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Department of Housing and Urban Development for annual contributions for assisted housing (rescission numbered R87-44) proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

term.name: Department of Housing and Urban Development

bill.summary: 1/29/1987--Introduced. Rescinds budget authority for the Department of Housing and Urban Development for annual contributions for assisted housing (R87-44).
